JobFullDesc: Facebook’s Enterprise Engineering (EE) is responsible for fulfilling all internal end user IT needs. The EE Ops Business Intelligence (BI) team is responsible for all data and analytic solutions for all functions within EE Ops. The team is seeking an experienced, insightful, forward-thinking BI. This BI will work closely with business owners to understand, identify, design and implement efficient and effective solutions. As a valued member of the Enterprise organization, this person will focus on all technical aspects of business intelligence, while also provides leadership in managing BI development activities, through a managed service arrangement. This is a full-time position with less than 20% travel required.Translate business requirements and needs into data and analytic solutions, within multiple areas in IT Ops, including customer support and services, supply chain management, technology deployment.Leverage data to understand in depth IT business processes, identify areas of opportunity for process improvement.Participate in the on-going development of the business intelligence and data warehousing functions within the wider organization.Participate in the creation and support of development standards and best practices.Explore and recommend emerging technologies and techniques to support/enhance BI landscape components.Support business processes and projects through data modeling, reporting and analytics.Develop deep understanding of analytical data models.
